description:
Ushio finds out about everything that happened in the past. Because he doesn`t want anyone else to die, he rises up once again. Hakumen no Mono heads to mainland Japan, bringing chaos wherever it goes, and at the same time, a huge typhoon engulfs all of Japan. The shards of the Beast Spear attacks all of the Hiyou embedded in everyone`s minds, and their memories of Ushio and Tora return. Everyone`s hope is restored, as they know that as long as Ushio and Tora are there, there is hope.
Source: crunchyroll
